name: Jaja Ding Dong Húsavík
description: Colourful bar and café attached to the Húsavík Eurovision Exhibition, inspired by the Netflix film 'Eurovision Song Contest: The Story of Fire Saga'. Guests can enjoy cocktails, coffee and light bites surrounded by costumes, props and memorabilia from the movie. It's a fun hangout for Eurovision fans with lively sing-alongs and views over Húsavík and Skjálfandi Bay.

opening_hours.general: Seasonal hours; typically open daily from late afternoon into the evening. Check the Eurovision Exhibition website for current times.
